name: Petty Theft (Prototype)
description:
Petty Theft is an attempt to mix the stealth genre with momentum-based platformers.

After wasting massive amounts of money on frankly unnecessary vigilante equipment, Rob Toppet turns to a life of crime in a desperate attempt to pay back the debt he's now acquired.

Steal money, run and jump around the place, commit property damage, and more importantly, try to avoid getting caught on camera.
